name: The Cloak of Darkness
description:
Cloak of Darkness is an interactive fiction game designed to help with the comparison of IF development languages. 

This is a RPG Maker MV port of the game.
Since RPG Maker MV is technically NOT an "IF development language". 
This game has deviated some from the original specifications, to see what could be done with the game using RPG Maker MV.

CONTROLS:
Interact: Z/Space/Enter/Arrow Keys
